Hi Zak,

On 6/12/07, Zak Jacobson <jacobsonz@...> wrote:
>  I am looking for some training for my team in effective unit testing.
>   I have found a few through google searches.  Does anyone have any
>  first hand knowledge they can share?
>
>  I'd like a course that can focus on the benefits of unit testing, how
>  to use mocks, how to harness the power of TDD, how to sniff out code
>  smells that unit testing exposes (and what to do about it).
>
>  Thanks-
>  Zak

I've been running hands-on, 2-day classroom trainings on this exact
stuff for the past couple of years in Europe for Java programmers.
Feel free to drop me a mail at "firstname.lastname@..." if you want
to discuss this further in private.

Best regards,
Lasse

-- 
Lasse Koskela
* Author of "Test Driven" (Manning Publications, 2007) *
* Reaktor Innovations * http://www.ri.fi/en *
